. RoboSats developers will never contact: . Los desarrolladores de RoboSats nunca se pondr√°n en contacto contigo. Los desarrolladores o coordinadores nunca pedir√°n el token de tu robot.
All of them as long as they are fast. Yo: All of them as long as they are fast. You can write down your preferred payment method(s). You will have to match with a peer who also accepts that method. The step to exchange fiat has a expiry time of 24 hours before a dispute is automatically open. We highly recommend using instant fiat payment rails.
At no point, AnonymousAlice01 and Baffli: En ning√∫n momento, AnonymousAlice01 y BafflingBob02 tienen que confiarse los fondos de bitcoin entre ellos. En caso de conflicto, el coordinador de RoboSats ayudar√° a resolver la disputa.
Be aware your fiat payment provider migh: Ten en cuenta que tu pasarela de pagos fiat puede cobrarte comisiones extra. En cualquier caso, estos costes siempre son cubiertos por el comprador. Esto incluye, comisiones de transferencia, costes bancarios y horquilla de intercambio de divisas. El vendedor debe recibir la cantidad exacta que se detalla en la orden.
During a typical order, your trading pee: Durante una orden t√≠pica, tu contraparte comercial es la √∫nica que podr√≠a llegar a adivinar algo sobre ti. Mant√©n tu chat corto y conciso. Evita proporcionar informaci√≥n que no sea estrictamente necesaria para el pago en fiat.
Each RoboSats coordinator will set a max: Each RoboSats coordinator will set a maximum trade size to minimize the hassle of lightning routing failures. There is no limits to the number of trades per day. A robot can only have one order at a time. However, you can use multiple robots simultaneously using the Robot garage. Remember to back up your robot tokens!
In many countries using RoboSats is no d: En muchos pa√≠ses usar RoboSats no es diferente a usar Ebay o WallaPop. Es responsabilidad del usuario conocer y cumplir la ley.
It is a BTC/FIAT peer-to-peer exchange o: Es un exchange P2P que facilita intercambios bitcoin/fiat sobre Lightning.
It simplifies matchmaking and minimizes: Simplifica el emparejamiento y minimiza la necesidad de confianza. RoboSats se centra en la privacidad y la velocidad.
RoboSats is a decentralized exchange wit: RoboSats is a decentralized exchange with multiple, fully redundant, trade coordinators. The coordinator provides the infrastructure for your trade: mantains the intermediary lightning node, does book keeping, and relays your encrypted chat messages. The coordinator is also the judge in case your order enters a dispute. The coordinator is a trusted role, make sure you trust your coordinator by exploring its profile, webpage, social media and the comments from other users online.
RoboSats is an open source project: RoboSats is an open source project
The RoboSats client, which you run on yo: El cliente RoboSats, que ejecutas en tu m√°quina local o navegador, no recopila ni comparte tu direcci√≥n IP, ubicaci√≥n, nombre o datos personales. El cliente cifra tus mensajes privados, que s√≥lo pueden ser descifrados por tu compa√±ero de intercambio.
The coordinator you choose will maintain: El coordinador que elijas mantendr√° una base de datos de robots seud√≥nimos y √≥rdenes para que la aplicaci√≥n funcione correctamente. Puedes mejorar a√∫n m√°s tu privacidad utilizando nodos proxy o coinjoining.
The seller faces the same charge-back ri: El vendedor enfrenta el mismo riesgo de devoluci√≥n de cargo que con cualquier otro servicio peer-to-peer. No se recomiendan PayPal o tarjetas de cr√©dito.
The trade fee is collected by the robosa: The trade fee is collected by the robosats coordinator as a compensation for their service. You can see the fees of each coordinator by checking out their profile. The trade fee is split to be covered by both: the order maker and the order taker. Typically, the maker fee will be significantly smaller than the taker fee. In case an onchain address is used to received the Sats a variable swap fee applies. The onchain payout fee can also be seen in the profile of the coordinator.
This is an experimental application, thi: Esta es una aplicaci√≥n experimental, podr√≠a haber errores. ¬°Intercambia peque√±as cantidades!
This lightning application is provided a: This lightning application is provided as is. It is in active development: trade with the utmost caution. There is no private support. Support is only offered via public channels

You can also check the full guide in: You can also check the full guide in
You can build more trust on the RoboSats: Puedes construir m√°s confianza en la infraestructura de RoboSats y del coordinador inspeccionando el c√≥digo fuente.
You can find a step-by-step description: You can find a step-by-step description of the trade pipeline in
Your sats will return to you. Any hold i: Your sats will return to you. Any hold invoice that is not settled would be automatically returned even if the coordinator goes down forever. This is true for both, locked bonds and trading escrows. However, there is a small window between the seller confirms FIAT RECEIVED and the moment the buyer receives the satoshis when the funds could be permanently lost if the coordinator disappears. This window is usually about 1 second long. Make sure to have enough inbound liquidity to avoid routing failures. If you have any problem, reach out trough the RoboSats public channels or directly to your trade coordinator using one of the contact methods listed on their profile.
Your trade partner will not know the des: Your trade partner will not know the destination of the Lightning payment. The permanence of the data collected by the coordinators depend on their privacy and data policies. If a dispute arises, a coordinator may request additional information. The specifics of this process can vary from coordinator to coordinator.
